message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split is fair considering the inflation working against you.
Alice, my turn! Let's make this quick. I'm feeling the inflation already. This offer accounts for the time pressure.
Bob, that last offer was much too low. I'm offering a compromise.  Let's end this before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Alice, time is running out! This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.  Take it or leave it!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm trying to be fair, but your greed is going to cost you. This is my final offer.
